trans-unit.source: Represents an element for associating a semantic value with a phrase in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 表示将语义的值与在语法中的短语相关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: This object is similar to the `tag` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 此对象是类似于`tag`由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0。](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property of this object cannot be script.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>此对象的属性不能为脚本。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> can be of the type <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>可以是类型<xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.Double>， <xref:System.Int32>，或<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: String values must be enclosed in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值必须括在双引号内。

trans-unit.source: To add semantics as script, use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加作为脚本的语义，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>类，同时指定实例的值。

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a name and a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>类，指定名称和实例的值。

trans-unit.source: The string used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的字符串<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>属性<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The object used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 用于进行设置的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: name为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含的名称的字符串<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将名称设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将名称设置为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中包含的值<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The valid types for the Value property are: - <xref:System.Boolean> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: 为 Value 属性的有效类型是:- <xref:System.Boolean>- <xref:System.Double>- <xref:System.Int32>- <xref:System.String></xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的值<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将值设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将值设置为无效的类型。
